oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Women Throughout the Month of June
المرأة في شهر
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bint Al Nil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article presents a collection of women-related news covering the month of June, such as the end of service of two foreign ambassadresses to Egypt. It also features a brief coverage of three charity parties held in June.
تستعرض المقالة أخبار المرأة خلال شهر يونية الماضي، منها مغادرة سفيرتين أجنبيتين لمصر بعد انتهاء مدة خدمتهما فيها. كما تقدم المقالة تغطية للحفلات الخيرية التي أقيمت خلال الشهر.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; The American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
